1‚Üí# College Coach Profile System - UI/UX Design Document
     2‚Üí## ATHLEAD Recruiting Platform
     3‚Üí
     4‚Üí---
     5‚Üí
     6‚Üí## Executive Summary
     7‚Üí
     8‚ÜíThis document outlines the comprehensive UI/UX design for a dual-profile system for college coaches in the ATHLEAD recruiting platform. The system enables coaches to manage both a personal coaching profile and a sport-specific program profile, providing athletes with detailed information about both the coach and the athletic program they represent.
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üí---
    11‚Üí
    12‚Üí## Table of Contents
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí1. [Design Philosophy](#design-philosophy)
    15‚Üí2. [User Flows](#user-flows)
    16‚Üí3. [Profile Architecture](#profile-architecture)
    17‚Üí4. [Personal Coach Profile](#personal-coach-profile)
    18‚Üí5. [Program Profile](#program-profile)
    19‚Üí6. [Navigation Patterns](#navigation-patterns)
    20‚Üí7. [Component Specifications](#component-specifications)
    21‚Üí8. [Data Models](#data-models)
    22‚Üí9. [SwiftUI Implementation Guide](#swiftui-implementation-guide)
    23‚Üí10. [View Modes](#view-modes)
    24‚Üí11. [Accessibility Considerations](#accessibility-considerations)
    25‚Üí
    26‚Üí---
    27‚Üí
    28‚Üí## Design Philosophy
    29‚Üí
    30‚Üí### Core Principles
    31‚Üí
    32‚Üí1. **Dual Identity**: Clear separation between coach as individual and program as entity
    33‚Üí2. **Contextual Switching**: Seamless navigation between personal and program profiles
    34‚Üí3. **Recruiter-Athlete Focus**: Information architecture optimized for recruiting conversations
    35‚Üí4. **Visual Hierarchy**: Sport-specific branding while maintaining platform consistency
    36‚Üí5. **Transparency**: Comprehensive program information to build trust with recruits
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üí### Design Language
    39‚Üí
    40‚Üí- **Platform**: iOS-native SwiftUI implementation
    41‚Üí- **Visual Style**: Professional recruiting aesthetic with athletic program branding
    42‚Üí- **Color System**: Platform primary colors + program-specific accent colors
    43‚Üí- **Typography**: SF Pro for system text, emphasis on hierarchy
    44‚Üí- **Spacing**: Consistent 8px grid system (matching existing ATHLEAD design)
    45‚Üí
    46‚Üí---
    47‚Üí
    48‚Üí## User Flows
    49‚Üí
    50‚Üí### Primary User Journey
    51‚Üí
    52‚Üí```
    53‚ÜíCoach Login
    54‚Üí    |
    55‚Üí    v
    56‚ÜíProfile Hub (Landing)
    57‚Üí    |
    58‚Üí    +---> Personal Coach Profile
    59‚Üí    |         |
    60‚Üí    |         +---> Edit Personal Info
    61‚Üí    |         +---> View as Athlete Sees
    62‚Üí    |         +---> Credentials & Bio
    63‚Üí    |
    64‚Üí    +---> Program Profile
    65‚Üí              |
    66‚Üí              +---> Edit Program Info
    67‚Üí              +---> Manage Roster
    68‚Üí              +---> Update Facilities
    69‚Üí              +---> Post Achievements
    70‚Üí              +---> View as Athlete Sees
    71‚Üí```
    72‚Üí
    73‚Üí### Athlete Viewing Journey
    74‚Üí
    75‚Üí```
    76‚ÜíAthlete Search/Browse
    77‚Üí    |
    78‚Üí    v
    79‚ÜíCoach Discovery
    80‚Üí    |
    81‚Üí    +---> Coach Personal Profile
    82‚Üí    |         |
    83‚Üí    |         +---> View Credentials
    84‚Üí    |         +---> Message Coach
    85‚Üí    |         +---> See Associated Program
    86‚Üí    |
    87‚Üí    +---> Program Profile
    88‚Üí              |
    89‚Üí              +---> Explore Team Culture
    90‚Üí              +---> View Facilities
    91‚Üí              +---> See Current Roster
    92‚Üí              +---> Check Academic Resources
    93‚Üí              +---> Contact Coaching Staff
    94‚Üí```
    95‚Üí
    96‚Üí---
    97‚Üí
    98‚Üí## Profile Architecture
    99‚Üí
   100‚Üí### Profile Hub Landing
   101‚Üí
   102‚ÜíThe Profile Hub serves as the central navigation point for coaches to manage both profiles.
   103‚Üí

   678‚Üí```swift
   679‚Üístruct ProfileCard: View {
   680‚Üí    let title: String
   681‚Üí    let icon: String
   682‚Üí    let description: String
   683‚Üí    let action: () -> Void
   684‚Üí

   687‚Üí            HStack(spacing: 16) {
   688‚Üí                Image(systemName: icon)

   690‚Üí                    .foregroundColor(.blue)
   691‚Üí                    .frame(width: 50, height: 50)

   693‚Üí                    .clipShape(Circle())

   698‚Üí                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
   699‚Üí
   700‚Üí                    Text(description)
   701‚Üí                        .font(.subheadline)
   702‚Üí                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)

   705‚Üí
   706‚Üí                Spacer()

   709‚Üí                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

   711‚Üí            .padding(20)
   712‚Üí            .background(Color(.systemGray6))
   713‚Üí            .cornerRadius(16)

   881‚Üí
   882‚Üí```swift
   883‚Üístruct CoachProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
   884‚Üí    let id: String
   885‚Üí
   886‚Üí    // Basic Information
   887‚Üí    var firstName: String
   888‚Üí    var lastName: String

   890‚Üí    var profileImageURL: String?
   891‚Üí    var bio: String
   892‚Üí
   893‚Üí    // Professional Details
   894‚Üí    var yearsExperience: Int
   895‚Üí    var eduEmail: String
   896‚Üí    var phone: String?
   897‚Üí    var officeLocation: String?
   898‚Üí
   899‚Üí    // Education & Credentials
   900‚Üí    var education: [Education]
   901‚Üí    var certifications: [Certification]
   902‚Üí
   903‚Üí    // Coaching Philosophy
   904‚Üí    var philosophy: String?
   905‚Üí
   906‚Üí    // Career Highlights
   907‚Üí    var highlights: [String]
   908‚Üí    var awards: [Award]
   909‚Üí
   910‚Üí    // Association
   911‚Üí    var programId: String       // Links to Program Profile
   912‚Üí    var schoolId: String
   913‚Üí    var schoolName: String
   914‚Üí    var sport: String
   915‚Üí
   916‚Üí    // Social & Contact
   917‚Üí    var socialLinks: SocialLinks
   918‚Üí
   919‚Üí    // Metadata
   920‚Üí    var createdAt: Date
   921‚Üí    var updatedAt: Date
   922‚Üí    var isVerified: Bool
   923‚Üí
   924‚Üí    var fullName: String {
   925‚Üí        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
   926‚Üí    }
   927‚Üí}
   928‚Üí
   929‚Üístruct Education: Identifiable, Codable {
   930‚Üí    let id: String
   931‚Üí    var degree: String          // B.S., M.S., Ph.D., etc.
   932‚Üí    var field: String           // Exercise Science, etc.
   933‚Üí    var institution: String

   936‚Üí
   937‚Üístruct Certification: Identifiable, Codable {

   943‚Üí}
   944‚Üí
   945‚Üístruct Award: Identifiable, Codable {
   946‚Üí    let id: String
   947‚Üí    var title: String

   950‚Üí}
   951‚Üí
   952‚Üístruct SocialLinks: Codable {

   957‚Üí}

  1198‚Üí```swift
  1199‚Üíimport SwiftUI
  1200‚Üí
  1201‚Üístruct ProfileHubView: View {

  1203‚Üí    @State private var navigateToCoachProfile = false
  1204‚Üí    @State private var navigateToProgramProfile = false
  1205‚Üí
  1206‚Üí    var body: some View {
  1207‚Üí        NavigationStack {
  1208‚Üí            ZStack {
  1209‚Üí                // Background gradient
  1210‚Üí                LinearGradient(
  1211‚Üí                    gradient: Gradient(colors: [
  1212‚Üí                        Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
  1213‚Üí                        Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
  1214‚Üí                    ]),
  1215‚Üí                    startPoint: .topLeading,
  1216‚Üí                    endPoint: .bottomTrailing
  1217‚Üí                )
  1218‚Üí                .ignoresSafeArea()
  1219‚Üí
  1220‚Üí                ScrollView {
  1221‚Üí                    VStack(spacing: 24) {
  1222‚Üí                        // Header Section
  1223‚Üí                        headerSection
  1224‚Üí                            .padding(.top, 20)
  1225‚Üí
  1226‚Üí                        // Profile Type Cards
  1227‚Üí                        VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1228‚Üí                            ProfileTypeCard(
  1229‚Üí                                icon: "person.fill",
  1230‚Üí                                title: "Personal Profile",
  1231‚Üí                                description: "View and manage your coaching credentials",
  1232‚Üí                                iconColor: .blue
  1233‚Üí                            ) {
  1234‚Üí                                navigateToCoachProfile = true
  1235‚Üí                            }
  1236‚Üí
  1237‚Üí                            ProfileTypeCard(
  1238‚Üí                                icon: "building.2.fill",
  1239‚Üí                                title: "\(viewModel.programName) Program",
  1240‚Üí                                description: "Manage your team's recruiting presence",
  1241‚Üí                                iconColor: .orange
  1242‚Üí                            ) {
  1243‚Üí                                navigateToProgramProfile = true
  1244‚Üí                            }
  1245‚Üí                        }
  1246‚Üí                        .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1247‚Üí
  1248‚Üí                        // Recent Activity

  1250‚Üí                            .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1251‚Üí
  1252‚Üí                        Spacer(minLength: 40)
  1253‚Üí                    }
  1254‚Üí                }
  1255‚Üí            }
  1256‚Üí            .navigationTitle("Profile Hub")
  1257‚Üí            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.large)
  1258‚Üí            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToCoachProfile) {
  1259‚Üí                CoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.coachViewModel)
  1260‚Üí            }
  1261‚Üí            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToProgramProfile) {
  1262‚Üí                ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)
  1263‚Üí            }
  1264‚Üí        }
  1265‚Üí    }
  1266‚Üí
  1267‚Üí    private var headerSection: some View {
  1268‚Üí        VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1269‚Üí            // Profile Photo

  1271‚Üí                image
  1272‚Üí                    .resizable()
  1273‚Üí                    .aspectRatio(contentMode: .fill)
  1274‚Üí            } placeholder: {
  1275‚Üí                Image(systemName: "person.circle.fill")
  1276‚Üí                    .resizable()
  1277‚Üí                    .foregroundColor(.gray)

  1279‚Üí            .frame(width: 120, height: 120)
  1280‚Üí            .clipShape(Circle())
  1281‚Üí            .overlay(

  1285‚Üí            .shadow(radius: 10)
  1286‚Üí
  1287‚Üí            // Name and Title

  1289‚Üí                .font(.title2)

  1291‚Üí                .foregroundColor(.white)
  1292‚Üí
  1293‚Üí            Text(viewModel.title)

  1295‚Üí                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.9))
  1296‚Üí
  1297‚Üí            Text(viewModel.schoolName)
  1298‚Üí                .font(.footnote)
  1299‚Üí                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.7))
  1300‚Üí        }
  1301‚Üí    }
  1302‚Üí
  1303‚Üí    private var activitySection: some View {

  1309‚Üí
  1310‚Üí            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {

  1312‚Üí                    ActivityRowView(activity: activity)

  1314‚Üí            }
  1315‚Üí            .padding(16)
  1316‚Üí            .background(
  1317‚Üí                RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
  1318‚Üí                    .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.3))
  1319‚Üí                    .overlay(

  1321‚Üí                            .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.2), lineWidth: 1)
  1322‚Üí                    )
  1323‚Üí            )
  1324‚Üí        }
  1325‚Üí    }
  1326‚Üí}

  1332‚Üíimport SwiftUI

  1334‚Üístruct CoachProfileView: View {

  1363‚Üí

  1384‚Üí                        toggleSection("credentials")
  1385‚Üí                    } content: {
  1386‚Üí                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {

  1394‚Üí                            }
  1395‚Üí
  1396‚Üí                            ForEach(viewModel.certifications) { cert in
  1397‚Üí                                CredentialRow(

  1403‚Üí                            }
  1404‚Üí                        }
  1405‚Üí                        .padding(20)
  1406‚Üí                    }
  1407‚Üí
  1408‚Üí                    // Philosophy Section
  1409‚Üí                    if let philosophy = viewModel.philosophy {
  1410‚Üí                        ExpandableSection(
  1411‚Üí                            title: "Coaching Philosophy",
  1412‚Üí                            isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("philosophy")

  1422‚Üí
  1423‚Üí                    // Career Highlights

  1427‚Üí                    ) {
  1428‚Üí                        toggleSection("highlights")
  1429‚Üí                    } content: {
  1430‚Üí                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
  1431‚Üí                            ForEach(viewModel.highlights, id: \.self) { highlight in
  1432‚Üí                                HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 8) {

  1440‚Üí                        }

  1443‚Üí

  1454‚Üí
  1455‚Üí                                Text(viewModel.programName)
  1456‚Üí                                    .font(.body)
  1457‚Üí                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
  1458‚Üí                                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1459‚Üí                            }
  1460‚Üí
  1461‚Üí                            Spacer()
  1462‚Üí
  1463‚Üí                            Image(systemName: "chevron.right")

  1466‚Üí                        .padding(20)

  1470‚Üí
  1471‚Üí                    // Contact Information
  1472‚Üí                    ExpandableSection(
  1473‚Üí                        title: "Contact Information",

  1478‚Üí                        VStack(spacing: 12) {

  1483‚Üí                            if let office = viewModel.officeLocation {

  1485‚Üí                            }
  1486‚Üí                        }
  1487‚Üí                        .padding(20)
  1488‚Üí                    }
  1489‚Üí                }
  1490‚Üí                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1491‚Üí                .padding(.top, 20)
  1492‚Üí                .padding(.bottom, 40)
  1493‚Üí            }
  1494‚Üí        }
  1495‚Üí        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
  1496‚Üí        .navigationTitle("Coach Profile")
  1497‚Üí        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
  1498‚Üí        .toolbar {
  1499‚Üí            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
  1500‚Üí                if viewModel.isOwnProfile {
  1501‚Üí                    Button("Edit") {
  1502‚Üí                        showingEditView = true
  1503‚Üí                    }
  1504‚Üí                }
  1505‚Üí            }
  1506‚Üí        }
  1507‚Üí        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
  1508‚Üí            EditCoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
  1509‚Üí        }
  1510‚Üí    }
  1511‚Üí
  1512‚Üí    private func toggleSection(_ section: String) {
  1513‚Üí        withAnimation(.spring()) {
  1514‚Üí            if expandedSections.contains(section) {
  1515‚Üí                expandedSections.remove(section)
  1516‚Üí            } else {
  1517‚Üí                expandedSections.insert(section)
  1518‚Üí            }
  1519‚Üí        }
  1520‚Üí    }
  1521‚Üí}

  1524‚Üí#### ProgramProfileView.swift
  1525‚Üí
  1526‚Üí```swift
  1527‚Üíimport SwiftUI
  1528‚Üí
  1529‚Üíenum ProgramTab: String, CaseIterable {
  1530‚Üí    case overview = "Overview"
  1531‚Üí    case roster = "Roster"
  1532‚Üí    case facilities = "Facilities"
  1533‚Üí}
  1534‚Üí
  1535‚Üístruct ProgramProfileView: View {
  1536‚Üí    @ObservedObject var viewModel: ProgramProfileViewModel
  1537‚Üí    @State private var selectedTab: ProgramTab = .overview
  1538‚Üí    @State private var showingEditView = false
  1539‚Üí
  1540‚Üí    var body: some View {
  1541‚Üí        ScrollView {
  1542‚Üí            VStack(spacing: 0) {
  1543‚Üí                // Hero Banner
  1544‚Üí                ProgramHeroSection(
  1545‚Üí                    heroImageURL: viewModel.heroImageURL,
  1546‚Üí                    logoURL: viewModel.logoURL,
  1547‚Üí                    programName: viewModel.programName,
  1548‚Üí                    conference: viewModel.conference,
  1549‚Üí                    division: viewModel.division,
  1550‚Üí                    gradientColors: viewModel.gradientColors
  1551‚Üí                )
  1552‚Üí
  1553‚Üí                // Quick Stats
  1554‚Üí                QuickStatsView(
  1555‚Üí                    founded: viewModel.founded,
  1556‚Üí                    conferenceTitles: viewModel.conferenceChampionships,
  1557‚Üí                    nationalRanking: viewModel.currentRanking
  1558‚Üí                )
  1559‚Üí                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1560‚Üí                .padding(.top, -30)
  1561‚Üí
  1562‚Üí                // Tab Navigation
  1563‚Üí                TabBarView(selectedTab: $selectedTab)
  1564‚Üí                    .padding(.top, 20)
  1565‚Üí
  1566‚Üí                // Tab Content
  1567‚Üí                VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1568‚Üí                    switch selectedTab {
  1569‚Üí                    case .overview:
  1570‚Üí                        overviewContent
  1571‚Üí                    case .roster:
  1572‚Üí                        rosterContent
  1573‚Üí                    case .facilities:
  1574‚Üí                        facilitiesContent
  1575‚Üí                    }
  1576‚Üí                }
  1577‚Üí                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1578‚Üí                .padding(.top, 20)
  1579‚Üí                .padding(.bottom, 40)
  1580‚Üí            }
  1581‚Üí        }
  1582‚Üí        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
  1583‚Üí        .navigationTitle("Program Profile")
  1584‚Üí        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
  1585‚Üí        .toolbar {
  1586‚Üí            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
  1587‚Üí                if viewModel.canEdit {
  1588‚Üí                    Button("Edit") {
  1589‚Üí                        showingEditView = true
  1590‚Üí                    }
  1591‚Üí                }
  1592‚Üí            }
  1593‚Üí        }
  1594‚Üí        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
  1595‚Üí            EditProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
  1596‚Üí        }
  1597‚Üí    }
  1598‚Üí
  1599‚Üí    private var overviewContent: some View {
  1600‚Üí        VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1601‚Üí            // Program Overview
  1602‚Üí            ContentSection(title: "Program Overview") {
  1603‚Üí                Text(viewModel.overview)
  1604‚Üí                    .font(.body)
  1605‚Üí                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1606‚Üí            }
  1607‚Üí
  1608‚Üí            // Recent Achievements
  1609‚Üí            ContentSection(title: "Recent Achievements") {
  1610‚Üí                VStack(spacing: 12) {

  1612‚Üí                        AchievementBadge(
  1613‚Üí                            icon: achievement.icon,
  1614‚Üí                            title: achievement.title,
  1615‚Üí                            subtitle: String(achievement.year)
  1616‚Üí                        )
  1617‚Üí                    }
  1618‚Üí                }
  1619‚Üí            }
  1620‚Üí
  1621‚Üí            // Culture & Values
  1622‚Üí            ContentSection(title: "Program Culture & Values") {
  1623‚Üí                VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1624‚Üí                    HStack(spacing: 12) {
  1625‚Üí                        ForEach(viewModel.cultureValues, id: \.self) { value in
  1626‚Üí                            Text(value)
  1627‚Üí                                .font(.caption)
  1628‚Üí                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
  1629‚Üí                                .foregroundColor(.blue)
  1630‚Üí                                .padding(.horizontal, 12)
  1631‚Üí                                .padding(.vertical, 6)
  1632‚Üí                                .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
  1633‚Üí                                .cornerRadius(16)
  1634‚Üí                        }
  1635‚Üí                    }
  1636‚Üí
  1637‚Üí                    Text(viewModel.cultureDescription)
  1638‚Üí                        .font(.body)
  1639‚Üí                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
  1640‚Üí                }
  1641‚Üí            }
  1642‚Üí
  1643‚Üí            // Recruiting Priorities
  1644‚Üí            ContentSection(title: "Recruiting Priorities") {
  1645‚Üí                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
  1646‚Üí                    ForEach(viewModel.recruitingPriorities) { priority in
  1647‚Üí                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
  1648‚Üí                            Text(priority.graduatingClass)
  1649‚Üí                                .font(.subheadline)
  1650‚Üí                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
  1651‚Üí                                .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1652‚Üí
  1653‚Üí                            VStack(spacing: 8) {
  1654‚Üí                                ForEach(priority.positions) { position in
  1655‚Üí                                    RecruitingPriorityCard(
  1656‚Üí                                        position: position.position,
  1657‚Üí                                        isPriority: position.isPriority
  1658‚Üí                                    )
  1659‚Üí                                }
  1660‚Üí                            }
  1661‚Üí                        }
  1662‚Üí                    }
  1663‚Üí                }
  1664‚Üí            }
  1665‚Üí
  1666‚Üí            // Academic Support
  1667‚Üí            ContentSection(title: "Academic Support") {
  1668‚Üí                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {

  1670‚Üí                        .font(.body)
  1671‚Üí                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1672‚Üí
  1673‚Üí                    if let gpa = viewModel.academicSupport.teamGPA,
  1674‚Üí                       let gradRate = viewModel.academicSupport.graduationRate {

  1678‚Üí                                label: "Team GPA"
  1679‚Üí                            )
  1680‚Üí                            StatsPill(
  1681‚Üí                                value: "\(Int(gradRate))%",
  1682‚Üí                                label: "Grad Rate"
  1683‚Üí                            )
  1684‚Üí                        }
  1685‚Üí                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
  1686‚Üí                    }
  1687‚Üí                }
  1688‚Üí            }
  1689‚Üí
  1690‚Üí            // Coaching Staff
  1691‚Üí            ContentSection(title: "Coaching Staff") {

  1694‚Üí                        NavigationLink(destination: CoachProfileDetailView(coachId: coach.id)) {
  1695‚Üí                            CoachStaffRow(coach: coach)
  1696‚Üí                        }
  1697‚Üí                    }
  1698‚Üí                }
  1699‚Üí            }
  1700‚Üí        }
  1701‚Üí    }
  1702‚Üí
  1703‚Üí    private var rosterContent: some View {
  1704‚Üí        VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1705‚Üí            // Filter Options
  1706‚Üí            HStack(spacing: 12) {
  1707‚Üí                ForEach(["All", "Seniors", "Juniors", "Sophomores", "Freshmen"], id: \.self) { filter in
  1708‚Üí                    FilterChip(title: filter, isSelected: viewModel.selectedFilter == filter) {
  1709‚Üí                        viewModel.selectedFilter = filter
  1710‚Üí                    }
  1711‚Üí                }
  1712‚Üí            }

  1715‚Üí            ForEach(viewModel.rosterByClass, id: \.classYear) { section in

  1718‚Üí                        .font(.headline)

  1720‚Üí
  1721‚Üí                    VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1722‚Üí                        ForEach(section.players) { player in
  1723‚Üí                            PlayerCardView(player: player)

  1725‚Üí                    }
  1726‚Üí                }
  1727‚Üí            }
  1728‚Üí        }
  1729‚Üí    }
  1730‚Üí
  1731‚Üí    private var facilitiesContent: some View {
  1732‚Üí        VStack(spacing: 16) {

  1740‚Üí
  1741‚Üí---
  1742‚Üí
  1743‚Üí## View Modes
  1744‚Üí
  1745‚Üí### Edit Mode vs View Mode
  1746‚Üí
  1747‚Üí#### Edit Mode Features
  1748‚Üí
  1749‚Üí**Personal Coach Profile Edit Mode:**
  1750‚Üí- Inline editing of all text fields
  1751‚Üí- Photo upload capabilities
  1752‚Üí- Add/remove credentials
  1753‚Üí- Reorder highlights
  1754‚Üí- Preview toggle
  1755‚Üí- Save/Cancel buttons in toolbar
  1756‚Üí
  1757‚Üí**Program Profile Edit Mode:**
  1758‚Üí- Multi-section edit interface
  1759‚Üí- Bulk roster import
  1760‚Üí- Facility photo management
  1761‚Üí- Recruiting priority editor
  1762‚Üí- Color theme customization
  1763‚Üí- Draft/Publish status
  1764‚Üí
  1765‚Üí#### View Mode Context
  1766‚Üí
  1767‚Üí**Coach Viewing Own Profile:**
  1768‚Üí- Edit button visible
  1769‚Üí- Analytics visible (views, engagement)
  1770‚Üí- Privacy settings accessible
  1771‚Üí- Quick actions prominent
  1772‚Üí
  1773‚Üí**Athlete Viewing Coach Profile:**
  1774‚Üí- Contact buttons prominent
  1775‚Üí- Social proof emphasized
  1776‚Üí- Related programs suggested
  1777‚Üí- Save/bookmark option
  1778‚Üí- Share functionality
  1779‚Üí
  1780‚Üí**Athlete Viewing Program Profile:**
  1781‚Üí- Contact coaching staff prominent
  1782‚Üí- Application/interest form
  1783‚Üí- Comparison tools
  1784‚Üí- Similar programs suggested
  1785‚Üí- Virtual tour access
  1786‚Üí
  1787‚Üí---
  1788‚Üí
  1789‚Üí## Accessibility Considerations
  1790‚Üí
  1791‚Üí### WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance
  1792‚Üí
  1793‚Üí#### Color Contrast
  1794‚Üí- All text maintains 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum
  1795‚Üí- Large text (>18pt) maintains 3:1 ratio
  1796‚Üí- Interactive elements have clear focus states
  1797‚Üí- Program colors validated for accessibility
  1798‚Üí
  1799‚Üí#### Navigation
  1800‚Üí- Clear heading hierarchy (H1 ‚Üí H6)
  1801‚Üí- Skip navigation links
  1802‚Üí- Breadcrumb navigation
  1803‚Üí- Keyboard navigation support
  1804‚Üí
  1805‚Üí#### Screen Reader Support
  1806‚Üí- Semantic HTML/SwiftUI elements
  1807‚Üí- ARIA labels on custom components
  1808‚Üí- Alt text for all images
  1809‚Üí- Descriptive link text
  1810‚Üí
  1811‚Üí#### Interactive Elements
  1812‚Üí- Minimum tap target: 44x44pt
  1813‚Üí- Clear focus indicators
  1814‚Üí- Error messages clearly associated
  1815‚Üí- Form validation feedback
  1816‚Üí
  1817‚Üí#### Motion & Animation
  1818‚Üí- Respect reduced motion settings
  1819‚Üí- No auto-playing videos
  1820‚Üí- Pause/stop controls for carousels
  1821‚Üí- Animation duration < 5 seconds
  1822‚Üí
  1823‚Üí### VoiceOver Optimization
  1824‚Üí
  1825‚Üí```swift
  1826‚Üí// Example VoiceOver implementation
  1827‚ÜíImage(systemName: "envelope.fill")
  1828‚Üí    .accessibilityLabel("Email")
  1829‚Üí    .accessibilityHint("Contact coach via email")
  1830‚Üí
  1831‚ÜíButton(action: { /* action */ }) {
  1832‚Üí    Text("View Program")
  1833‚Üí}
  1834‚Üí.accessibilityLabel("View University of Texas Volleyball Program")
  1835‚Üí.accessibilityHint("Navigates to program profile")
  1836‚Üí```
  1837‚Üí
  1838‚Üí---
  1839‚Üí
  1840‚Üí## Implementation Checklist
  1841‚Üí
  1842‚Üí### Phase 1: Core Structure
  1843‚Üí- [ ] Data models created
  1844‚Üí- [ ] View model architecture established
  1845‚Üí- [ ] Profile Hub view implemented
  1846‚Üí- [ ] Navigation flow working
  1847‚Üí- [ ] Basic styling applied
  1848‚Üí
  1849‚Üí### Phase 2: Personal Profile
  1850‚Üí- [ ] Coach profile view complete
  1851‚Üí- [ ] Edit mode implemented
  1852‚Üí- [ ] Credentials section working
  1853‚Üí- [ ] Contact information functional
  1854‚Üí- [ ] Photo upload working
  1855‚Üí
  1856‚Üí### Phase 3: Program Profile
  1857‚Üí- [ ] Program overview complete
  1858‚Üí- [ ] Roster management working
  1859‚Üí- [ ] Facilities section implemented
  1860‚Üí- [ ] Tab navigation functional
  1861‚Üí- [ ] Edit mode complete
  1862‚Üí
  1863‚Üí### Phase 4: Integration
  1864‚Üí- [ ] API service integration
  1865‚Üí- [ ] Image upload/storage
  1866‚Üí- [ ] Real-time updates
  1867‚Üí- [ ] Search integration
  1868‚Üí- [ ] Analytics tracking
  1869‚Üí
  1870‚Üí### Phase 5: Polish
  1871‚Üí- [ ] Accessibility audit
  1872‚Üí- [ ] Performance optimization
  1873‚Üí- [ ] Error handling
  1874‚Üí- [ ] Loading states
  1875‚Üí- [ ] Empty states
  1876‚Üí- [ ] Offline support
  1877‚Üí
  1878‚Üí---
  1879‚Üí
  1880‚Üí## Future Enhancements
  1881‚Üí
  1882‚Üí### Version 2.0 Features
  1883‚Üí1. **Video Integration**: Coach introduction videos, facility tours
  1884‚Üí2. **Interactive Timeline**: Career progression visualization
  1885‚Üí3. **Recruit Messaging**: Built-in communication tools
  1886‚Üí4. **Calendar Integration**: Schedule visits, camps
  1887‚Üí5. **Analytics Dashboard**: Profile performance metrics
  1888‚Üí6. **Virtual Tours**: 3D facility exploration
  1889‚Üí7. **Comparison Tools**: Side-by-side program comparison
  1890‚Üí8. **Scholarship Calculator**: Financial aid estimation
  1891‚Üí9. **Application Tracking**: Recruit interest pipeline
  1892‚Üí10. **Social Feed**: Program updates and news
  1893‚Üí
  1894‚Üí### Advanced Features
  1895‚Üí- AI-powered recruit matching
  1896‚Üí- Video analysis integration
  1897‚Üí- Parent portal access
  1898‚Üí- Multi-language support
  1899‚Üí- Export to PDF/print
  1900‚Üí- QR code sharing
  1901‚Üí- NFC business card integration
  1902‚Üí
  1903‚Üí---
  1904‚Üí
  1905‚Üí## Conclusion
  1906‚Üí
  1907‚ÜíThis design system provides a comprehensive foundation for the dual-profile college coach system in ATHLEAD. The separation between personal coach profiles and program profiles allows for detailed, context-appropriate information presentation while maintaining platform consistency and usability.
  1908‚Üí
  1909‚Üí**Key Success Metrics:**
  1910‚Üí- Profile completion rate > 85%
  1911‚Üí- Athlete engagement time > 3 minutes
  1912‚Üí- Message conversion rate > 15%
  1913‚Üí- Mobile performance score > 90
  1914‚Üí
  1915‚Üí**Design Principles Summary:**
  1916‚Üí1. Clear information hierarchy
  1917‚Üí2. Mobile-first responsive design
  1918‚Üí3. Accessibility as core feature
  1919‚Üí4. Performance optimization
  1920‚Üí5. Consistent user experience
  1921‚Üí6. Scalable component system
  1922‚Üí
  1923‚Üí---

  1925‚Üí## Appendix

# College Coach Profile System - UI/UX Design Document
## ATHLEAD Recruiting Platform

---

## Executive Summary

This document outlines the comprehensive UI/UX design for a dual-profile system for college coaches in the ATHLEAD recruiting platform. The system enables coaches to manage both a personal coaching profile and a sport-specific program profile, providing athletes with detailed information about both the coach and the athletic program they represent.

---

## Table of Contents

1. [Design Philosophy](#design-philosophy)
2. [User Flows](#user-flows)
3. [Profile Architecture](#profile-architecture)
4. [Personal Coach Profile](#personal-coach-profile)
5. [Program Profile](#program-profile)
6. [Navigation Patterns](#navigation-patterns)
7. [Component Specifications](#component-specifications)
8. [Data Models](#data-models)
9. [SwiftUI Implementation Guide](#swiftui-implementation-guide)
10. [View Modes](#view-modes)
11. [Accessibility Considerations](#accessibility-considerations)

---

## Design Philosophy

### Core Principles

1. **Dual Identity**: Clear separation between coach as individual and program as entity
2. **Contextual Switching**: Seamless navigation between personal and program profiles
3. **Recruiter-Athlete Focus**: Information architecture optimized for recruiting conversations
4. **Visual Hierarchy**: Sport-specific branding while maintaining platform consistency
5. **Transparency**: Comprehensive program information to build trust with recruits

### Design Language

- **Platform**: iOS-native SwiftUI implementation
- **Visual Style**: Professional recruiting aesthetic with athletic program branding
- **Color System**: Platform primary colors + program-specific accent colors
- **Typography**: SF Pro for system text, emphasis on hierarchy
- **Spacing**: Consistent 8px grid system (matching existing ATHLEAD design)

---

## User Flows

### Primary User Journey

```
Coach Login
    |
    v
Profile Hub (Landing)
    |
    +---> Personal Coach Profile
    |         |
    |         +---> Edit Personal Info
    |         +---> View as Athlete Sees
    |         +---> Credentials & Bio
    |
    +---> Program Profile
              |
              +---> Edit Program Info
              +---> Manage Roster
              +---> Update Facilities
              +---> Post Achievements
              +---> View as Athlete Sees
```

### Athlete Viewing Journey

```
Athlete Search/Browse
    |
    v
Coach Discovery
    |
    +---> Coach Personal Profile
    |         |
    |         +---> View Credentials
    |         +---> Message Coach
    |         +---> See Associated Program
    |
    +---> Program Profile
              |
              +---> Explore Team Culture
              +---> View Facilities
              +---> See Current Roster
              +---> Check Academic Resources
              +---> Contact Coaching Staff
```

---

## Profile Architecture

### Profile Hub Landing

The Profile Hub serves as the central navigation point for coaches to manage both profiles.

#### Layout Structure

```

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§

‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   Recent Activity                    ‚îÇ <- Activity Feed
‚îÇ   ‚óã 5 new athlete views today        ‚îÇ

- Full-width cards with subtle border
- Icon + Title + Description layout
- Chevron right indicator
- Tap target: entire card
- Background: `.systemGray6` with corner radius 16pt
- Padding: 20pt all sides
- Spacing between cards: 16pt

### Section Specifications

#### Hero Section
- **Height**: 350pt
- **Background**: Program-branded gradient (customizable)
- **Profile Photo**:
  - Size: 120pt diameter
  - Border: 4pt white stroke
  - Shadow: subtle drop shadow
  - Position: Center, 100pt from top
- **Name Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Display, Bold, 28pt
  - Color: White
- **Title Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Text, Semibold, 16pt
  - Color: White 90% opacity
- **Institution Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Text, Regular, 14pt
  - Color: White 80% opacity
- **Action Buttons**:
  - Style: Pill buttons
  - Background: White 20% opacity, blur effect
  - Text: White
  - Icons: SF Symbols
  - Spacing: 12pt between buttons

#### Stats Bar
- **Layout**: 3-column grid
- **Background**: White with 95% opacity
- **Border**: 1pt gray stroke, corner radius 12pt
- **Cell Layout**:
  - Top: Large number (24pt, Bold)
  - Bottom: Label (12pt, Secondary color)
  - Dividers: 1pt vertical lines between cells
- **Padding**: 16pt vertical, edge-to-edge horizontal

#### Content Sections
All sections follow consistent pattern:
- **Header**:
  - Chevron indicator (expandable/collapsible)
  - Title: 18pt, Semibold
  - Padding: 16pt vertical
- **Card Background**:
  - Color: `.systemBackground`
  - Border: 1pt `.separator` color
  - Corner radius: 12pt
  - Padding: 20pt
  - Shadow: subtle elevation
- **Content Spacing**: 12pt between items

## Navigation Patterns

### Profile Switching

**Method 1: Profile Hub (Recommended)**
- Central hub accessed from Profile tab
- Visual cards for each profile type
- Clear separation of contexts

**Method 2: Segmented Control**
```
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ  ‚îè‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îì‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îì  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚îÉ  Personal  ‚îÉ  Program Profile ‚îÉ  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ‚îó‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îõ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îõ  ‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
‚îÇ  [Profile content based on selection] ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
```

**Method 3: Contextual Linking**
- Cross-link between profiles
- "View Associated Program" button on personal profile
- "Meet the Coaching Staff" on program profile

### Navigation Hierarchy

```
Main Tab Bar
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Feed
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Search
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AI Assistant
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Messages
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Profile (College Coach)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Profile Hub (Landing)
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Personal Coach Profile
    ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Edit Personal Info
    ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ View as Athlete
    ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Settings
    ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ

    ‚îÇ       ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Update Facilities
    ‚îÇ       ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Post Updates
    ‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ View as Athlete
    ‚îÇ
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Settings
```

### Transitions

**Profile Hub to Profile**
- Push navigation (slide from right)
- Maintains navigation stack
- Back button returns to hub

**Between Personal and Program**
- Cross-fade transition
- Maintains scroll position preference
- Smooth visual continuity

**Edit Mode**
- Modal presentation (sheet)
- Full-screen on iPhone
- Card style on iPad
- Dismiss gesture enabled

### Reusable Components

#### Profile Card Component

```swift
struct ProfileCard: View {
    let title: String
    let icon: String
    let description: String
    let action: () -> Void

    var body: some View {
        Button(action: action) {
            HStack(spacing: 16) {
                Image(systemName: icon)
                    .font(.system(size: 24))
                    .foregroundColor(.blue)
                    .frame(width: 50, height: 50)
                    .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
                    .clipShape(Circle())

                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                    Text(title)
                        .font(.headline)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    Text(description)
                        .font(.subheadline)
                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                        .lineLimit(2)
                }

                Spacer()

                Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
            }
            .padding(20)
            .background(Color(.systemGray6))
            .cornerRadius(16)
        }
        .buttonStyle(PlainButtonStyle())
    }
}
```

#### Section Header Component

```swift
struct SectionHeader: View {
    let title: String
    @Binding var isExpanded: Bool

    var body: some View {
        Button(action: {
            withAnimation(.spring()) {
                isExpanded.toggle()
            }
        }) {
            HStack {
                Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                    .rotationEffect(.degrees(isExpanded ? 90 : 0))
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                Text(title)
                    .font(.title3)
                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)

                Spacer()
            }
            .padding(.vertical, 12)
        }
        .buttonStyle(PlainButtonStyle())
    }
}
```

#### Info Row Component

```swift
struct InfoRow: View {
    let icon: String
    let iconColor: Color
    let label: String
    let value: String

    var body: some View {
        HStack(spacing: 16) {
            Image(systemName: icon)
                .foregroundColor(.white)
                .frame(width: 40, height: 40)
                .background(iconColor.opacity(0.8))
                .clipShape(Circle())

            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                Text(label)
                    .font(.caption)
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                Text(value)
                    .font(.body)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
            }

            Spacer()
        }
    }
}
```

#### Recruiting Priority Card

```swift
struct RecruitingPriorityCard: View {
    let position: String
    let isPriority: Bool

    var body: some View {
        HStack {
            Image(systemName: "figure.volleyball")
                .foregroundColor(.blue)

            Text(position)
                .font(.body)
                .foregroundColor(.primary)

            Spacer()

            if isPriority {
                Text("PRIORITY")
                    .font(.caption2)
                    .fontWeight(.bold)
                    .foregroundColor(.white)
                    .padding(.horizontal, 8)
                    .padding(.vertical, 4)
                    .background(Color.orange)
                    .cornerRadius(4)
            }
        }
        .padding(12)
        .background(Color(.systemGray6))
        .cornerRadius(8)
    }
}
```

## Data Models

### Coach Model (Enhanced)

```swift
struct CoachProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String

    // Basic Information
    var firstName: String
    var lastName: String
    var title: String           // Head Coach, Assistant Coach, etc.
    var profileImageURL: String?
    var bio: String

    // Professional Details
    var yearsExperience: Int
    var eduEmail: String
    var phone: String?
    var officeLocation: String?

    // Education & Credentials
    var education: [Education]
    var certifications: [Certification]

    // Coaching Philosophy
    var philosophy: String?

    // Career Highlights
    var highlights: [String]
    var awards: [Award]

    // Association
    var programId: String       // Links to Program Profile
    var schoolId: String
    var schoolName: String
    var sport: String

    // Social & Contact
    var socialLinks: SocialLinks

    // Metadata
    var createdAt: Date
    var updatedAt: Date
    var isVerified: Bool

    var fullName: String {
        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
    }
}

struct Education: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var degree: String          // B.S., M.S., Ph.D., etc.
    var field: String           // Exercise Science, etc.
    var institution: String
    var graduationYear: Int
}

struct Certification: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String            // AVCA Certified, etc.
    var issuingOrganization: String
    var issueDate: Date
    var expirationDate: Date?
}

struct Award: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var title: String
    var year: Int
    var description: String?
}

struct SocialLinks: Codable {
    var twitter: String?
    var instagram: String?
    var linkedin: String?
    var personalWebsite: String?
}
```

### Program Profile Model

```swift
struct ProgramProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String

    // Basic Information
    var programName: String     // "University of Texas Volleyball"
    var sport: String
    var schoolId: String
    var schoolName: String

    // Branding
    var logoURL: String?
    var heroImageURL: String?
    var primaryColor: String    // Hex color
    var secondaryColor: String  // Hex color

    // Program Details
    var division: String        // NCAA Division I
    var conference: String      // Big 12
    var founded: Int?
    var overview: String

    // Team Culture
    var cultureValues: [String] // ["Excellence", "Teamwork", "Integrity"]
    var cultureDescription: String

    // Achievements
    var conferenceChampionships: Int
    var nationalChampionships: Int
    var currentRanking: Int?
    var recentAchievements: [Achievement]

    // Academic
    var teamGPA: Double?
    var graduationRate: Double?
    var academicSupport: AcademicSupport

    // Recruiting
    var recruitingPriorities: [RecruitingPriority]

    // Roster
    var roster: [PlayerProfile]

    // Facilities
    var facilities: [Facility]

    // Coaching Staff
    var coachingStaff: [CoachReference]

    // Schedule & Results
    var currentSeasonRecord: SeasonRecord?
    var recentMatches: [MatchResult]

    // Alumni
    var featuredAlumni: [AlumniProfile]

    // Metadata
    var createdAt: Date
    var updatedAt: Date
    var isPublished: Bool
}

struct Achievement: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var title: String
    var icon: String            // SF Symbol name
    var year: Int
    var description: String?
}

struct AcademicSupport: Codable {
    var description: String
    var resources: [String]     // ["Study halls", "Tutoring", etc.]
    var teamGPA: Double?
    var graduationRate: Double?
    var academicAllAmericans: Int?
}

struct RecruitingPriority: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var graduatingClass: String // "Class of 2025"
    var positions: [PositionNeed]
}

struct PositionNeed: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var position: String        // "Middle Blocker"
    var isPriority: Bool
    var quantity: Int           // Number of recruits needed
    var description: String?
}

struct PlayerProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var jerseyNumber: Int
    var firstName: String
    var lastName: String
    var position: String
    var classYear: String       // "Freshman", "Sophomore", etc.
    var height: String          // "6'1\""
    var hometown: String
    var highSchool: String?
    var photoURL: String?
    var starRating: Int?        // 1-5 stars
    var stats: PlayerStats?

    var fullName: String {
        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
    }
}

struct PlayerStats: Codable {
    var kills: Int?
    var blocks: Int?
    var aces: Int?
    var digs: Int?
    var assists: Int?
    // Sport-specific stats can be added
}

struct Facility: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String
    var type: FacilityType
    var description: String
    var features: [String]
    var imageURLs: [String]
    var capacity: Int?
    var openedYear: Int?
    var renovatedYear: Int?
}

enum FacilityType: String, Codable {
    case arena = "Arena"
    case trainingCenter = "Training Center"
    case academic = "Academic Facility"
    case lockerRoom = "Locker Room"
    case sportsMedicine = "Sports Medicine"
    case other = "Other"
}

struct CoachReference: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var coachProfileId: String  // Links to CoachProfile
    var name: String
    var title: String
    var photoURL: String?
    var yearsExperience: Int?
}

struct SeasonRecord: Codable {
    var season: String          // "2024"
    var wins: Int
    var losses: Int
    var conferenceWins: Int
    var conferenceLosses: Int
}

struct MatchResult: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var date: Date
    var opponent: String
    var isHome: Bool
    var result: MatchResultType
    var score: String           // "3-1", "3-0", etc.
}

enum MatchResultType: String, Codable {
    case win = "W"
    case loss = "L"
}

struct AlumniProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String
    var graduationYear: Int
    var currentRole: String     // "Professional Player", "Coach", etc.
    var description: String
    var photoURL: String?
}
```

### Example View Implementation

#### ProfileHubView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

struct ProfileHubView: View {
    @StateObject private var viewModel = ProfileHubViewModel()
    @State private var navigateToCoachProfile = false
    @State private var navigateToProgramProfile = false

    var body: some View {
        NavigationStack {
            ZStack {
                // Background gradient
                LinearGradient(
                    gradient: Gradient(colors: [
                        Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
                        Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
                    ]),
                    startPoint: .topLeading,
                    endPoint: .bottomTrailing
                )
                .ignoresSafeArea()

                ScrollView {
                    VStack(spacing: 24) {
                        // Header Section
                        headerSection
                            .padding(.top, 20)

                        // Profile Type Cards
                        VStack(spacing: 16) {
                            ProfileTypeCard(
                                icon: "person.fill",
                                title: "Personal Profile",
                                description: "View and manage your coaching credentials",
                                iconColor: .blue
                            ) {
                                navigateToCoachProfile = true
                            }

                            ProfileTypeCard(
                                icon: "building.2.fill",
                                title: "\(viewModel.programName) Program",
                                description: "Manage your team's recruiting presence",
                                iconColor: .orange
                            ) {
                                navigateToProgramProfile = true
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(.horizontal, 20)

                        // Recent Activity
                        activitySection
                            .padding(.horizontal, 20)

                        Spacer(minLength: 40)
                    }
                }
            }
            .navigationTitle("Profile Hub")
            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.large)
            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToCoachProfile) {
                CoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.coachViewModel)
            }
            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToProgramProfile) {
                ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)
            }
        }
    }

    private var headerSection: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 12) {
            // Profile Photo
            AsyncImage(url: URL(string: viewModel.profileImageURL)) { image in
                image
                    .resizable()
                    .aspectRatio(contentMode: .fill)
            } placeholder: {
                Image(systemName: "person.circle.fill")
                    .resizable()
                    .foregroundColor(.gray)
            }
            .frame(width: 120, height: 120)
            .clipShape(Circle())
            .overlay(
                Circle()
                    .stroke(Color.white, lineWidth: 4)
            )
            .shadow(radius: 10)

            // Name and Title
            Text(viewModel.coachName)
                .font(.title2)
                .fontWeight(.bold)
                .foregroundColor(.white)

            Text(viewModel.title)
                .font(.subheadline)
                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.9))

            Text(viewModel.schoolName)
                .font(.footnote)
                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.7))
        }
    }

    private var activitySection: some View {
        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
            Text("Recent Activity")
                .font(.title3)
                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                .foregroundColor(.white)

            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                ForEach(viewModel.recentActivity) { activity in
                    ActivityRowView(activity: activity)
                }
            }
            .padding(16)
            .background(
                RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                    .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.3))
                    .overlay(
                        RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                            .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.2), lineWidth: 1)
                    )
            )
        }
    }
}
```

#### CoachProfileView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

struct CoachProfileView: View {
    @ObservedObject var viewModel: CoachProfileViewModel
    @State private var showingEditView = false
    @State private var expandedSections: Set<String> = []

    var body: some View {
        ScrollView {
            VStack(spacing: 0) {
                // Hero Section
                CoachHeroSection(
                    profileImageURL: viewModel.profileImageURL,
                    name: viewModel.fullName,
                    title: viewModel.title,
                    schoolName: viewModel.schoolName,
                    programColors: viewModel.programColors,
                    onMessage: { viewModel.initiateMessage() },
                    onConnect: { viewModel.connect() }
                )

                // Stats Bar
                StatsBarView(
                    stats: [
                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.yearsExperience)", label: "Years Experience"),
                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.titlesWon)", label: "Titles Won"),
                        Stat(value: viewModel.division, label: "Division")
                    ]
                )
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, -30)  // Overlap with hero

                // Content Sections
                VStack(spacing: 16) {
                    // About Section
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "About",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("about")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("about")
                    } content: {
                        Text(viewModel.bio)
                            .font(.body)
                            .foregroundColor(.primary)
                            .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Credentials Section
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Credentials & Education",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("credentials")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("credentials")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
                            ForEach(viewModel.education) { edu in
                                CredentialRow(
                                    icon: "graduationcap.fill",
                                    title: "\(edu.degree) \(edu.field)",
                                    subtitle: edu.institution,
                                    iconColor: .blue
                                )
                            }

                            ForEach(viewModel.certifications) { cert in
                                CredentialRow(
                                    icon: "seal.fill",
                                    title: cert.name,
                                    subtitle: cert.issuingOrganization,
                                    iconColor: .green
                                )
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Philosophy Section
                    if let philosophy = viewModel.philosophy {
                        ExpandableSection(
                            title: "Coaching Philosophy",
                            isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("philosophy")
                        ) {
                            toggleSection("philosophy")
                        } content: {
                            Text(philosophy)
                                .font(.body)
                                .foregroundColor(.primary)
                                .padding(20)
                        }
                    }

                    // Career Highlights
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Career Highlights",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("highlights")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("highlights")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                            ForEach(viewModel.highlights, id: \.self) { highlight in
                                HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 8) {
                                    Text("‚Ä¢")
                                        .foregroundColor(.blue)
                                    Text(highlight)
                                        .font(.body)
                                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Associated Program Link
                    NavigationLink(destination: ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)) {
                        HStack {
                            Image(systemName: "building.2.fill")
                                .foregroundColor(.orange)

                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                                Text("Associated Program")
                                    .font(.caption)
                                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                                Text(viewModel.programName)
                                    .font(.body)
                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
                            }

                            Spacer()

                            Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                        .background(Color(.systemGray6))
                        .cornerRadius(12)
                    }

                    // Contact Information
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Contact Information",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("contact")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("contact")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(spacing: 12) {
                            ContactRow(icon: "envelope.fill", value: viewModel.email)
                            if let phone = viewModel.phone {
                                ContactRow(icon: "phone.fill", value: phone)
                            }
                            if let office = viewModel.officeLocation {
                                ContactRow(icon: "building.fill", value: office)
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }
                }
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, 20)
                .padding(.bottom, 40)
            }
        }
        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
        .navigationTitle("Coach Profile")
        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
        .toolbar {
            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
                if viewModel.isOwnProfile {
                    Button("Edit") {
                        showingEditView = true
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
            EditCoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
        }
    }

    private func toggleSection(_ section: String) {
        withAnimation(.spring()) {
            if expandedSections.contains(section) {
                expandedSections.remove(section)
            } else {
                expandedSections.insert(section)
            }
        }
    }
}
```

#### ProgramProfileView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

enum ProgramTab: String, CaseIterable {
    case overview = "Overview"
    case roster = "Roster"
    case facilities = "Facilities"
}

struct ProgramProfileView: View {
    @ObservedObject var viewModel: ProgramProfileViewModel
    @State private var selectedTab: ProgramTab = .overview
    @State private var showingEditView = false

    var body: some View {
        ScrollView {
            VStack(spacing: 0) {
                // Hero Banner
                ProgramHeroSection(
                    heroImageURL: viewModel.heroImageURL,
                    logoURL: viewModel.logoURL,
                    programName: viewModel.programName,
                    conference: viewModel.conference,
                    division: viewModel.division,
                    gradientColors: viewModel.gradientColors
                )

                // Quick Stats
                QuickStatsView(
                    founded: viewModel.founded,
                    conferenceTitles: viewModel.conferenceChampionships,
                    nationalRanking: viewModel.currentRanking
                )
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, -30)

                // Tab Navigation
                TabBarView(selectedTab: $selectedTab)
                    .padding(.top, 20)

                // Tab Content
                VStack(spacing: 16) {
                    switch selectedTab {
                    case .overview:
                        overviewContent
                    case .roster:
                        rosterContent
                    case .facilities:
                        facilitiesContent
                    }
                }
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, 20)
                .padding(.bottom, 40)
            }
        }
        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
        .navigationTitle("Program Profile")
        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
        .toolbar {
            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
                if viewModel.canEdit {
                    Button("Edit") {
                        showingEditView = true
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
            EditProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
        }
    }

    private var overviewContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            // Program Overview
            ContentSection(title: "Program Overview") {
                Text(viewModel.overview)
                    .font(.body)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
            }

            // Recent Achievements
            ContentSection(title: "Recent Achievements") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.recentAchievements) { achievement in
                        AchievementBadge(
                            icon: achievement.icon,
                            title: achievement.title,
                            subtitle: String(achievement.year)
                        )
                    }
                }
            }

            // Culture & Values
            ContentSection(title: "Program Culture & Values") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    HStack(spacing: 12) {
                        ForEach(viewModel.cultureValues, id: \.self) { value in
                            Text(value)
                                .font(.caption)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundColor(.blue)
                                .padding(.horizontal, 12)
                                .padding(.vertical, 6)
                                .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
                                .cornerRadius(16)
                        }
                    }

                    Text(viewModel.cultureDescription)
                        .font(.body)
                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                }
            }

            // Recruiting Priorities
            ContentSection(title: "Recruiting Priorities") {
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.recruitingPriorities) { priority in
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
                            Text(priority.graduatingClass)
                                .font(.subheadline)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundColor(.primary)

                            VStack(spacing: 8) {
                                ForEach(priority.positions) { position in
                                    RecruitingPriorityCard(
                                        position: position.position,
                                        isPriority: position.isPriority
                                    )
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            // Academic Support
            ContentSection(title: "Academic Support") {
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                    Text(viewModel.academicSupport.description)
                        .font(.body)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    if let gpa = viewModel.academicSupport.teamGPA,
                       let gradRate = viewModel.academicSupport.graduationRate {
                        HStack(spacing: 20) {
                            StatsPill(
                                value: String(format: "%.1f", gpa),
                                label: "Team GPA"
                            )
                            StatsPill(
                                value: "\(Int(gradRate))%",
                                label: "Grad Rate"
                            )
                        }
                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
                    }
                }
            }

            // Coaching Staff
            ContentSection(title: "Coaching Staff") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.coachingStaff) { coach in
                        NavigationLink(destination: CoachProfileDetailView(coachId: coach.id)) {
                            CoachStaffRow(coach: coach)
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    private var rosterContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            // Filter Options
            HStack(spacing: 12) {
                ForEach(["All", "Seniors", "Juniors", "Sophomores", "Freshmen"], id: \.self) { filter in
                    FilterChip(title: filter, isSelected: viewModel.selectedFilter == filter) {
                        viewModel.selectedFilter = filter
                    }
                }
            }

            // Roster by Class
            ForEach(viewModel.rosterByClass, id: \.classYear) { section in
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                    Text("\(section.classYear) (\(section.players.count))")
                        .font(.headline)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    VStack(spacing: 12) {
                        ForEach(section.players) { player in
                            PlayerCardView(player: player)
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    private var facilitiesContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            ForEach(viewModel.facilities) { facility in
                FacilityCardView(facility: facility)
            }
        }
    }
}
```

---

## View Modes

### Edit Mode vs View Mode

#### Edit Mode Features

**Personal Coach Profile Edit Mode:**
- Inline editing of all text fields
- Photo upload capabilities
- Add/remove credentials
- Reorder highlights
- Preview toggle
- Save/Cancel buttons in toolbar

**Program Profile Edit Mode:**
- Multi-section edit interface
- Bulk roster import
- Facility photo management
- Recruiting priority editor
- Color theme customization
- Draft/Publish status

#### View Mode Context

**Coach Viewing Own Profile:**
- Edit button visible
- Analytics visible (views, engagement)
- Privacy settings accessible
- Quick actions prominent

**Athlete Viewing Coach Profile:**
- Contact buttons prominent
- Social proof emphasized
- Related programs suggested
- Save/bookmark option
- Share functionality

**Athlete Viewing Program Profile:**
- Contact coaching staff prominent
- Application/interest form
- Comparison tools
- Similar programs suggested
- Virtual tour access

---

## Accessibility Considerations

### WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance

#### Color Contrast
- All text maintains 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum
- Large text (>18pt) maintains 3:1 ratio
- Interactive elements have clear focus states
- Program colors validated for accessibility

#### Navigation
- Clear heading hierarchy (H1 ‚Üí H6)
- Skip navigation links
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Keyboard navigation support

#### Screen Reader Support
- Semantic HTML/SwiftUI elements
- ARIA labels on custom components
- Alt text for all images
- Descriptive link text

#### Interactive Elements
- Minimum tap target: 44x44pt
- Clear focus indicators
- Error messages clearly associated
- Form validation feedback

#### Motion & Animation
- Respect reduced motion settings
- No auto-playing videos
- Pause/stop controls for carousels
- Animation duration < 5 seconds

### VoiceOver Optimization

```swift
// Example VoiceOver implementation
Image(systemName: "envelope.fill")
    .accessibilityLabel("Email")
    .accessibilityHint("Contact coach via email")

Button(action: { /* action */ }) {
    Text("View Program")
}
.accessibilityLabel("View University of Texas Volleyball Program")
.accessibilityHint("Navigates to program profile")
```

---

## Implementation Checklist

### Phase 1: Core Structure
- [ ] Data models created
- [ ] View model architecture established
- [ ] Profile Hub view implemented
- [ ] Navigation flow working
- [ ] Basic styling applied

### Phase 2: Personal Profile
- [ ] Coach profile view complete
- [ ] Edit mode implemented
- [ ] Credentials section working
- [ ] Contact information functional
- [ ] Photo upload working

### Phase 3: Program Profile
- [ ] Program overview complete
- [ ] Roster management working
- [ ] Facilities section implemented
- [ ] Tab navigation functional
- [ ] Edit mode complete

### Phase 4: Integration
- [ ] API service integration
- [ ] Image upload/storage
- [ ] Real-time updates
- [ ] Search integration
- [ ] Analytics tracking

### Phase 5: Polish
- [ ] Accessibility audit
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Error handling
- [ ] Loading states
- [ ] Empty states
- [ ] Offline support

---

## Future Enhancements

### Version 2.0 Features
1. **Video Integration**: Coach introduction videos, facility tours
2. **Interactive Timeline**: Career progression visualization
3. **Recruit Messaging**: Built-in communication tools
4. **Calendar Integration**: Schedule visits, camps
5. **Analytics Dashboard**: Profile performance metrics
6. **Virtual Tours**: 3D facility exploration
7. **Comparison Tools**: Side-by-side program comparison
8. **Scholarship Calculator**: Financial aid estimation
9. **Application Tracking**: Recruit interest pipeline
10. **Social Feed**: Program updates and news

### Advanced Features
- AI-powered recruit matching
- Video analysis integration
- Parent portal access
- Multi-language support
- Export to PDF/print
- QR code sharing
- NFC business card integration

---

## Conclusion

This design system provides a comprehensive foundation for the dual-profile college coach system in ATHLEAD. The separation between personal coach profiles and program profiles allows for detailed, context-appropriate information presentation while maintaining platform consistency and usability.

**Key Success Metrics:**
- Profile completion rate > 85%
- Athlete engagement time > 3 minutes
- Message conversion rate > 15%
- Mobile performance score > 90

**Design Principles Summary:**
1. Clear information hierarchy
2. Mobile-first responsive design
3. Accessibility as core feature
4. Performance optimization
5. Consistent user experience
6. Scalable component system

---

## Appendix

### Related Files
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/Coach.swift` - Existing coach model
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/School.swift` - School model reference
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Profile/ProfileView.swift` - Athlete profile pattern
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Auth/CollegeCoachProfileSetupView.swift` - Onboarding flow

### Design Resources
- SF Symbols catalog: https://developer.apple.com/sf-symbols/
- Human Interface Guidelines: https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/
- WCAG 2.1 Guidelines: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/

### Contact
For questions or clarifications about this design system, consult the ATHLEAD design team or reference the existing profile implementations in the codebase.

---

**Document Version:** 1.0
**Last Updated:** 2025-10-05
**Author:** UI/UX Design Team
**Status:** Ready for Implementation

import Foundation

struct PrivacySettings: Codable {
    var showFullName: Bool = true
    var showAddress: Bool = false
    var showPhone: Bool = false
    var showEmail: Bool = true
    var showBirthday: Bool = false
    var showSocialMedia: Bool = true
    var showGuardianInfo: Bool = false
}

struct User: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var fullName: String
    var username: String
    var bio: String
    var profileImageName: String
    var sport: String
    var position: String
    var classYear: String

    // Personal Information
    var address: String
    var phone: String
    var email: String
    var birthday: String

    // Social Media
    var instagram: String
    var twitter: String
    var youtube: String

content.text:
Perfect! I've updated the Player Profile Card with the following changes:

**Changes made to ProfileView.swift:**

1. **Name format (line 93)**: Now shows "Kinsley Young - 26" by extracting the last 2 digits from the class year
   - Uses `String(currentUser.classYear.suffix(2))` to get just "26" from "Class of 2026"

2. **Sport & Position abbreviations (line 99)**: Now shows "VB ‚Ä¢ MB" instead of "Volleyball ‚Ä¢ Middle Blocker ‚Ä¢ Class of 2026"

3. **Abbreviation logic (lines 10-57)**: Added computed properties that convert:
   - **Sports**: Volleyball‚ÜíVB, Basketball‚ÜíBB, Football‚ÜíFB, Soccer‚ÜíSOC, etc.
   - **Positions**: 
     - Volleyball: Middle Blocker‚ÜíMB, Outside Hitter‚ÜíOH, Setter‚ÜíS, Libero‚ÜíL
     - Basketball: Point Guard‚ÜíPG, Shooting Guard‚ÜíSG, Center‚ÜíC
     - Football: Quarterback‚ÜíQB, Running Back‚ÜíRB, Wide Receiver‚ÜíWR

The card is now much more compact and will save space while still clearly showing the player's identity, sport, position, and class year!

Perfect! Build succeeded. I've successfully updated **PublicProfileView.swift** to mirror the design of ProfileView.swift. Here's what changed:

## Changes to PublicProfileView.swift:

1. **Follow and Message buttons moved to the top** (lines 163-204):
   - **Follow button**: Positioned in the top-left navigation bar with blue primary color
   - **Message button**: Positioned in the top-right with glass effect styling
   - **More (ellipsis) button**: Positioned next to Message button

2. **Layout now mirrors ProfileView.swift**:
   - **Vertical navigation icons** (lines 80-133): Centered vertically on the right side with the same 5 icons (About, Athletics, Academics, Film, Posts)
   - **Player Profile Card** (lines 135-157): Positioned at the bottom left with abbreviated format ("Alex Martinez - 25" and "BB ‚Ä¢ PG")
   - Same gradient overlay and glass effects

3. **Removed the old scrollable content**: No more scrollable list of menu items at the bottom - now it's a clean, minimalist design matching the private ProfileView

The public profile view now has a consistent design with the private profile view, with the addition of Follow/Message actions at the top for viewing other users' profiles.

   223‚Üí    // Helper function to calculate image brightness
   224‚Üí    private func calculateImageBrightness(imageName: String) -> Double {
   225‚Üí        guard let uiImage = UIImage(named: imageName) else { return 0.5 }
   226‚Üí        guard let cgImage = uiImage.cgImage else { return 0.5 }
   227‚Üí
   228‚Üí        let width = cgImage.width
   229‚Üí        let height = cgImage.height
   230‚Üí        let bytesPerPixel = 4
   231‚Üí        let bytesPerRow = bytesPerPixel * width
   232‚Üí        let bitsPerComponent = 8
   233‚Üí
   234‚Üí        var pixelData = [UInt8](repeating: 0, count: width * height * bytesPerPixel)
   235‚Üí
   236‚Üí        guard let context = CGContext(
   237‚Üí            data: &pixelData,
   238‚Üí            width: width,
   239‚Üí            height: height,
   240‚Üí            bitsPerComponent: bitsPerComponent,
   241‚Üí            bytesPerRow: bytesPerRow,
   242‚Üí            space: CGColorSpaceCreateDeviceRGB(),
   243‚Üí            bitmapInfo: CGImageAlphaInfo.premultipliedLast.rawValue
   244‚Üí        ) else { return 0.5 }
   245‚Üí
   246‚Üí        context.draw(cgImage, in: CGRect(x: 0, y: 0, width: width, height: height))
   247‚Üí
   248‚Üí        // Sample the bottom portion of the image where the card will be
   249‚Üí        let sampleHeight = height / 4
   250‚Üí        let startY = height - sampleHeight
   251‚Üí
   252‚Üí        var totalBrightness: Double = 0
   253‚Üí        var pixelCount = 0
   254‚Üí
   255‚Üí        for y in startY..<height {
   256‚Üí            for x in 0..<width {
   257‚Üí                let offset = (y * width + x) * bytesPerPixel
   258‚Üí                let r = Double(pixelData[offset])
   259‚Üí                let g = Double(pixelData[offset + 1])
   260‚Üí                let b = Double(pixelData[offset + 2])
   261‚Üí
   262‚Üí                // Calculate perceived brightness using standard formula
   263‚Üí                let brightness = (0.299 * r + 0.587 * g + 0.114 * b) / 255.0
   264‚Üí                totalBrightness += brightness
   265‚Üí                pixelCount += 1
   266‚Üí            }
   267‚Üí        }
   268‚Üí
   269‚Üí        return pixelCount > 0 ? totalBrightness / Double(pixelCount) : 0.5
   270‚Üí    }
   271‚Üí}

content.text:
Perfect! Build succeeded. I've successfully implemented both fixes for **PublicProfileView.swift**:

## 1. **Adaptive Color System** (Automatic contrast detection):
- Added `calculateImageBrightness()` function (lines 223-270) that:
  - Analyzes the **bottom quarter** of the profile image (where the card and icons are)
  - Calculates perceived brightness using the standard luminance formula: `(0.299 * R + 0.587 * G + 0.114 * B)`
  - Returns a value between 0 (dark) and 1 (bright)

- When brightness > 0.6 (bright background), uses **black** text/icons
- When brightness ‚â§ 0.6 (dark background), uses **white** text/icons

- Applied adaptive color (`contentColor`) to:
  - Profile card text (name and sport/position)
  - All vertical navigation icons
  - Message button text
  - More (ellipsis) button

## 2. **Profile Card Positioning**:
- Changed `.padding(.bottom, .spacing4)` to `.padding(.bottom, 90)` (line 169)
- This positions the card **90 points above the bottom**, matching the ProfileView.swift positioning
- Now it sits **above the tab bar** instead of being hidden behind it

The view will now automatically adjust text and icon colors based on the brightness of the profile photo, ensuring they're always visible regardless of the image content!
I need the adaptive color for the whole page, see the side and top? you cant see the text or icons [Image #1]
You're absolutely right! The adaptive color needs to be applied to the navigation toolbar icons (the capsule background) as well. Let me update that:
